mapper.insert: INSERT INTO procurmentPlan (pp_id, pr_id, pp_materialRequiredProcessStage, pp_makeTime, pp_spendAmount, pp_regDate, pp_deliveryDate) VALUES (#{pp_id}, #{pr_id}, #{pp_materialRequiredProcessStage}, #{pp_makeTime}, #{pp_spendAmount}, #{pp_regDate}, #{pp_deliveryDate});
mapper.update: UPDATE procurmentPlan SET ppr_id = #{ppr_id}, ppr_dueDate = #{pp_dueDate}, ppr_quantity = #{pp_quantity} WHERE ppr_id = #{pp_id};
